book.bookDescription: Facebook web developer Stoyan Stefanov teaches you how to build components and organize them into maintainable, large-scale apps.
Get a brisk introduction to building fast, interactive single-page web applications with Vue.js, the popular JavaScript framework that organizes and simplifies web development.

book.bookTitle: ng-book: The Complete Guide to Angular 4
book.bookDescription: ng-book. The in-depth, complete, and up-to-date book on Angular 4. Become an Angular 4 expert today.

book.bookTitle: Learning GraphQL: Declarative Data Fetching for Modern Web Apps
book.bookDescription: GraphQL, a data query language that provides an alternative to REST and ad-hoc webservice architectures, is the most revolutionary technology for data fetching since Ajax.
Six days ago, astronaut Mark Watney became one of the first people to walk on Mars.

book.bookTitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
book.bookDescription: Harry Potter has never even heard of Hogwarts when the letters start dropping on the doormat at number four, Privet Drive.

book.bookTitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
book.bookDescription: The Triwizard Tournament is to be held at Hogwarts. Only wizards who are over seventeen are allowed to enter - but that doesn't stop Harry dreaming that he will win the competition.
The original Dark Lord of the Sith stars in his first ongoing series! Ever since Darth Vader's first on-screen appearance, he has become one of pop culture's most popular villains.
